body:
Features and Enhancements

Components
  • Enhancements
    • Exports
      • Provider List Details Export:
        • Using a single zip code radius search are an average of 2-3x faster over previous system performance.
      • Data Vintage - This data can now be exported
      • Exports on the new homepage had a filename with a "vn_" prefix. This prefix has been removed from the filename due to lack of user value.
      • Provider Details List:
        • Fixed: A system error caused some clients to not see the Provider Details List after they clicked on the number of market total unique providers while on Create a List screen.
      • Compare Networks:
        • Fixed: Non-NBO users can no longer export Compare Network CSV Files for a Model Network. This fix applies to both Exports:
          • Compare Networks Network Counts by Geography (CSV)
          • Compare Networks Network Counts by Specialty (CSV)
  • Homepage
    • Chart Widgets:
      • Fixed: Some clients experienced an issue with the values displayed in the My Top Network chart widget on the homepage.
      • The "Active Networks" filter was removed from the "My Top Network" chart widget.
      • Meanwhile, the "Active Networks" filter continues to apply to the "My Competitor Network" chart widget.
    • Top Competitor Network:
      • Users will now see the Top Competitor Network on the home page when one is available.
      • This will now be displayed on the homepage even when no available Client Networks exist.
    • Network Ranking:
      • Users can no longer add Models to Network Ranking filter criteria.
        • Targeted Audience: Brokers and no Brokers have NBO enabled.
      • The option to choose Ranked Network has been removed from the Settings > Network Exclusions dropdown.
    • Project Overview:
      • Project Name now uses the preferred name where available
    • Provisioner:
      • Fixed a Network360 error that appeared when a new provisioner user logged in for the first time under the new homepage.
    • Activity Stream, Cost Impact and Network Ranking:
      • Fixed: Non-Modelers can no longer view model activity from the Activity Stream.
      • Fixed: From the Activity Stream, users are now properly redirected to the Provider Details page within Cost Impact and includes par/non-par utilization for the Provider.
        • Previously, After the user clicked a Provider Activity Stream item, Network360 displayed the Provider Profile Page.
      • Fixed: Models are no longer available in Network Ranking. They are also no longer available in Settings > Network Rankings Network Exclusion Dropdown.
    • QA Mode - User Access:
      • Fixed: Users no longer have access to links within Network360 to Manage Users, Administration and My Things.
        • Additionally, Users no longer have access to Export Users, Activities and Security Audit Reports.
      • Fixed: Some participating clients experienced an error when switching between QA Mode and regular Network360.
  • Data Vintage
    • Fixed an error so that Published Network Models no longer Display on the Data Vintage page NOR within the Data Vintage Export - CSV Export.
    • Fixed an error so that users can no longer see published Model Networks on the Data Vintage page.
  • Provider Profile
    • Fixed: The Provider Profile now includes Custom Attributes on screen. Previously, the Custom Attributes were missing.
  • NBO
    • Fixed an error that caused Network360 time out if a user selected two attributes and did not select a network.
